Summary: I was going south on Coast Hyway going home and Orange object above the Encines Powerplant
trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Carlsbad
There were no other sightings in Carlsbad on or around July 27th 2013
divs: Sighting Details I was going south going home on coast highway, I looked up over the Encines Power plant there was a orange Orb moving very slow north over 300 feet smoke stack. It was solid orange, round to egg shape and was hovering then move slowly around. The object max 30 feet long and no sounds.
